docs.snippet: As more of our lives go online, online attackers are finding increasingly creative ways to wreak havoc using ransomware, and now, pyramid schemes.

headline.print_headline: Ransomware Gives Rise To Doubly Harmful Ponzi
headline.main: Ponzi Scheme Meets Ransomware for a Doubly Malicious Attack

docs.snippet: Organizers of a rally to be held on the 20th anniversary of the city’s handover to China say they have been denied permission to use a park that is the rally’s usual starting point.

headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Pro-Democracy Rally Displaced by Pro-Beijing Event, Organizers Say
headline.main: Hong Kong Pro-Democracy Rally Displaced by Pro-Beijing Event, Organizers Say

docs.snippet: Rachel gets to flex her no-nonsense bona fides in spurning DeMario’s plea for forgiveness and bidding farewell to Whaboom and the aspiring drummer Blake.

headline.print_headline: A Take-Charge ‘Bachelorette’ Sends the Boys Home
headline.main: A Take-Charge ‘Bachelorette’ Sends the Boys Home

docs.snippet: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for the attack at a checkpoint near the historic site, one of the oldest Christian monasteries in the world.

headline.print_headline: Gunmen Kill Police Officer Near a Monastery in Egypt
headline.main: Gunmen Kill Police Officer Near St. Catherine’s Monastery in Egypt

docs.snippet: Too often, gurus and instructors use their aura of spiritual goodness to exploit vulnerable students.

headline.print_headline: Yoga Teachers Need a Code of Ethics
headline.main: Yoga Teachers Need a Code of Ethics

docs.snippet: The literary establishment condemns his work. But people are buying it.
“The Defiant Ones” is less warts-and-all revealing than Dr. Dre and Mr. Iovine warrant, but that is the price of intimate access.

headline.print_headline: Who Tells Your Story? In This Case, HBO
headline.main: Review: In ‘The Defiant Ones,’ a Revealing Portrait of Dr. Dre and Jimmy Iovine

docs.snippet: There was relief that if short on concrete deals, the talks seemed to halt the downward spiral in relations and lack of contact between the two countries.

headline.print_headline: Russia Crows Over Putin’s Trump Meeting
headline.main: Russia Crows Over Putin’s Meeting With Trump

docs.snippet: Officer Jeronimo Yanez is on trial in Minnesota, charged in the shooting death of Philando Castile. Mr. Castile’s girlfriend, Ms. Reynolds, recorded the episode on Facebook Live.

headline.print_headline: In Court, Recounting the Moments Before a Shooting
headline.main: In Court, Diamond Reynolds Recounts Moments Before a Police Shooting

docs.snippet: The Out Front Theater Company is facing criticism for planning to show a play that tells stories from the Old Testament through the eyes of gay characters.

headline.print_headline: Atlanta Theater Faces Protests Over a Show
headline.main: An Atlanta Theater Faces Criticism for Gay Versions of Bible Stories
